features: This Water Rose 24 Hour Moisturizer Gel with rose water and hyaluronic acid provides lasting water fresh hydration and a clean finish
This lightweight moisturizer made with natural origin rose water and hyaluronic acid, is a powerful hydrator
The sheer water gel formula is instantly absorbed into skin replenishing moisture throughout the day without leaving a greasy residue
Water Rose 24 Hour Moisture Gel has a vegan formula made without parabens, oils, dyes, and phthalates

Commited to making Garnier a greener beauty brand: As a leading global beauty brand, we aspire to create a positive impact by paving the way towards more sustainable beauty. Approved by Cruelty Free International under the Leaping Bunny Program.
body.description: This lightweight moisturizer contains natural origin rose water and hyaluronic acid, a powerful hydrator. This non-comedogenic moisturizer is suitable for normal to combination types. The sheer water gel formula is instantly absorbed into skin, replenishing moisture throughout the day while leaving no greasy residue behind. Skin is soft and smooth, with a clean finish and the fresh scent of real rose water. This gentle moisturizer is free of parabens, oils, dyes, and phthalates.

Water Rose 24H Moisture Cream is a lightweight moisturizer with sheer water cream formula for normal to dry skin Water Rose 24H Moisture Gel is a light weight moisturizer with a sheer water gel formula for normal to combination skin.

Water Rose Micellar Cleansing Water Water Rose Moisture Gel Soothing Facial Mist with Rose Water Water Rose Moisture Gel Cream Skin Type Normal to Dry Normal to Combination All Skin Types Even Sensitive Normal to Dry Recommended Regimen Cleanse with Water Rose Micellar Cleansing Water Moisturize with Water Rose Moisture Gel Refresh With Soothing Facial Mist with Rose Water Moisturize with Water Rose Moisture Gel Skin Benefit Gently cleanses, removes makeup, and hydrates in one simple step. 24HR Water Fresh Hydration leaving skin feeling soft and smooth. Instantly hydrate and soothe skin after 1 use 24HR Water Fresh Hydration leaving skin feeling soft and smooth.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 6, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great value plus it feels & smells heavenly (Garnier SkinActive 24H Moisture Cream with Rose Water)
reviews.reviewText: Garnier SkinActive 24H Moisture Cream with Rose Water and Hyaluronic Acid is an amazing value, plus it feels and smells heavenly. I'm in my 50s and often in need of a little moisture and skin plumbing. Yet my skin still tends to be oily and prone to breakouts, so water creams (non-oil and non-cream-based) are a life-saver for me. It's lightweight, feels cool, soothing, and silky, and glides on easily so a dime-sized blob is enough for my face, neck, and chest. I use retinol serum at night and a copper peptides serum and sunscreen during the day, plus niacinamide and hyaluronic acid serums, so I use this only for moisturizing as needed. There are other water-based creams of similar price and quality, but I'm addicted to this stuff because of how lovely and silky it feels and also because of the light, delicate, faintly-herbal rose water scent. It doesn't smack you upside the head screaming ROSES like so many other rose water products do. Nor does it smell cloyingly sweet. It just delivers the skin-friendly benefits of rosewater (for toning and tightening) with just a hint of roses that I could inhale all day, and I'm usually a lavender kinda gal. Also, Garnier doesn't test on animals which is nice.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Most moisturizers leave my skin feeling oily and have more fragrance than I like. This moisturizer goes on nice and light, doesn't feel oily at all, and the fragrance is very light. I've only been using it for a little less than 2 weeks and my 70 year old skin feels so much better and looks great. I like it so well that I put it on subscription so I won't run out.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Bought it for my mom and she loves it! Very moisturizing and a little goes a long way.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Love this but now it has a different weird smell
reviews.reviewText: It used to really good with a good smell. They changed the formula may be, smell different but working fine may be.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 11, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars There's just something about it
reviews.reviewText: This moisturizing cream is fantastic. I don't know what it is, but my skin feels really wonderful and looks better. I feel it when I touch my face right after using, and also the next morning. I'm not sure what it is, if it's this or theRoC Daily Resurfacing Facial Disks I got at the same time. (I'll also review those) I'm using these two new products together, and my skin is softer and brighter.There is a scent to this, but it's very light and really pleasant. I say that as someone who's extremely sensitive to scent. In fact, I had to return the Neutrogena Triple Age Repair Anti-Aging Face Moisturizer (full name-with SPF 25 Sunscreen & Vitamin C, Dark Spot Remover & Firming Face & Neck Cream with Glycerin & Shea Butter) because it was sooo scented, and that scent just didn't fade. I was inundated with it for hours. Finally washed it off. I really don't care how well a moisturizer works if I can't stomach the scent.This Garnier moisturizer goes on light and smooth. It sinks in well. It does not feel sticky. It is not oily. It moisturizes beautifully. You don't need tons of it, use sparingly so the jar will last a long time. You can use it daily.Try it and do double-takes when you pass a mirror.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 30, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best most affordable moisturizer I found so far
reviews.reviewText: I have very sensitive, dry skin and it doesn’t always respond well to certain hydration products… But this one was definitely the exception to that! First off, it smells soooo good, refreshing and sweet, but not overpowering, which I like. I always hate lotions that smell too much like perfume. Secondly, the texture and consistency of this moisturizer is just perfect. It’s almost like a watered down gel texture. The light-weight consistency helps it spread onto my skin better as well as absorbs into my skin better. It doesn’t sit on top of my skin like other moisturizers I’ve used (that usually gives the effect of an oily, greasy sheen)… A little goes a long ways, which is nice because other moisturizers seem to only work when you slather on a whole greasy glob. But you don’t have to do that with this one… This is the best bang for your buck.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Absorbs easily, lightly scented
reviews.reviewText: I absolutely LOVE this skin moisturizer! I originally found it at a store that stopped carrying it, so I was thrilled to locate it on Amazon. This moisturizer goes on super smoothly and absorbs into my skin right away. I love it because it’s water based, so there is no greasy feel after application. It’s also a clean line, so it doesn’t have some of the harmful ingredients that other skin care products contain. I plan to continue using this moisturizer as long as it’s around. Highly recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 11, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I prefer a little more cream feel that the oil but it is good moisturizer.
I like the moisture and the scent the most..
Excelente producto y precio, lastima que ya no hay existencias en México.

reviews.reviewTitle: Soft skin and a heavenly scent
reviews.reviewText: I love this moisturizer, so of course it appears it's been discontinued. I love the rose scent and it leaves my skin moisturized and soft. Love it.
